casebody.data:
The State, ex rel. Grinnell, Appellant, v. Ohio Adult Parole Authority et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State, ex rel. Grinnell, v. Ohio Adult Parole Auth. (1991), 62 Ohio St.3d 201.]

(No. 91-1130 Submitted September 17, 1991 Decided December 11, 1991.) Timothy D. Grinnell, pro se. Lee I. Fisher, Attorney General, and Steven W. Ritz, for appellees. Per Curiam.

We affirm the judgment of the court of appeals on the basis of State, ex rel. Stamper, v. Ohio Adult Parole Auth. (1991), 62 Ohio St.3d 85, 578 N.E.2d 461.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
